description: ConTest json chamber registers address or commands schema

commands.description: Object with different chamber's register addresses or commands

CSZ-MCTB.description: Object with CSZ-MCTB chamber register addresses holding different chamber information

LP1_PV.description: Register address of LP1_PV (Loop1 Process Value), which is Current chamber temperature

LP1_SP.description: Register address of LP1_SP (Loop1 Set Point), which is Set value of the chamber temperature

LP2_PV.description: Register address of LP1_PV (Loop2 Process Value), which is Current chamber humidity

LP2_SP.description: Register address of LP1_SP (Loop1 Set Point), which is Set value of the chamber humidity

Prog_Name_Start.description: Starting register address of the program name

Prog_Name_Length.description: Total no of registers in which the program name is spread
